channel.title: Herald-Tribune (Custom RSS - Broad Article Grab)
channel.description: A personal RSS feed with broader article scraping from heraldtribune.com

item.title: October brings arts, culture season to the Sarasota-Manatee region
item.description: October brings a packed calendar ofarts and cultureto Sarasota and Manatee counties — from Broadway classics and opera debuts to art exhibitions, author talks, and family-friendly festivals. Whether you’re looking for symphony concerts, international dance, or Halloween magic shows, this guide gathers the best of the month’s events with all the details you need to plan your calendar.

item.title: 5 best free and fun things to do in Sarasota-Manatee this weekend
item.description: It's a new season in the Sarasota area — the start of fall, and snowbirds beginning to flock back forOctober— and you'll see both reflected in the lineup of events taking place this weekend, including free and outdoor options.

item.title: Herald-Tribune Boys Athlete of the Week winner Parrish Community High's Brycen Volz
item.description: Each week during the school year the Sarasota Herald-Tribune selects boys athletes that stood out the week before based on a combination of coach reports and school nominations sent to sports htincoming@gmail.com and our coverage. Those athletes are put in a poll sponsored by Central Florida Behavioral Health Network, Inc. each Monday on heraldtribune.com and you, our readers, vote on who you think did it best.To get to know our winners better, the Herald-Tribune will have a question-and-answer session with each athlete weekly.

item.title: High School Football Week 7 Sarasota, Manatee game previews and predictions
item.description: Preview capsules and predictions for high school football games being played by Sarasota and Manatee County teams on Friday, Oct. 3, 2025.

item.title: Florida death row has had women but not many. Have any been executed?
item.description: The Tennessee Supreme Court has scheduled the execution forthe only woman on the state's death row. 49-year-old Christa Gail Pike is set to be executed on Sept. 30, 2026, more than 31 years after she helped lure a teenage romantic rival into the woods, brutally killed her, and showed off a piece of the victim's skull to schoolmates.

item.title: Women on death row in Florida? What to know
item.description: Tennessee has scheduled theexecution of the only womanon the state's death row.

item.title: What to know about Fall 2025 time change, 1 month left…
item.description: As fall rolls inandHalloween decorationsstart popping up in yards and stores, as of Oct. 2, we are exactly one month away from falling back and changing our clocks to get one more hour of sleep and less daylight.

item.title: What insurance provider just signed contract with…
item.description: Sarasota Memorial Health Care System will bein-network with Cigna Healthcare, as of Oct. 1,when a new, two-year contract went into effect.

item.title: Wawa Florida grand opening happens as more are planned
item.description: Get ready to grab a hoagie and maybe score a free T-shirt. There are moreWawalocations coming to Florida this month, although aplanned grand opening in Ocalahas been delayed.

item.title: Texas Lottery gifts gas station $250,000 after $1.8…
item.description: The convenience store that sold a ticket in the$1.787 billion Powerballhad quite a payday, too.

item.title: NWS warning of high surf, risk for coastal flooding in…
item.description: Formerhurricanes Imelda and Humbertomay be gone, but their effects continue to be felt along Florida's coast.

item.title: Vote for Herald-Tribune's Football Midseason Offensive, Defensive Player of the Year
item.description: We have reached the halfway point of the Sarasota-Manatee high school football season. As we head into the second half of the season, we made our picks for thefront runners for Offensive and Defensive Player of the Year.

item.title: Local substitute teacher arrested for lewd conduct at school
item.description: The Manatee County Sheriff’s Office hasarrested a substitute teacherfollowing allegations of inappropriate conduct involving a student at Abel Elementary School, which is located at 7100 Madonna Place, Sarasota.

item.title: Military leaders deserve salute for silent reaction to Trump
item.description: We live in an area where evidence of support and admiration for military service members is everywhere.

item.title: Luxury condo tower pitched for downtown Sarasota with pools and park
item.description: A Chicago-baseddeveloperis looking to build a luxury condominium in downtown Sarasota's Rosemary District.
